productDescription:
You carry this bag over your shoulder or crossbody. On the inside you will find one large compartment and a small compartment for cards and receipts. Durga is made of leather, has a beautiful brass buckle closure, a side pocket on the front and a zipper on the front.
Â

optionalInfo.material: Our bags are made of naturally tanned leather. No chemicals were used during this process.
optionalInfo.fit:
- B24 x H26 x D10 cm 
- adjustable strap; min 48 cm, max 57 cm
- inside: 1 large compartment and 1 small compartment
- zipper and side pocket on the front
- Your Ipad fits in there
optionalInfo.production: BAGOA is fairly made in India.
